column1: #text=On Arbor Day this year , I decided to plant a new tree in my front yard .
#text=I went out and dug a hole where I decided the tree would go , and I kept the dirt I dug up off to the side for easy access to replant with .
#text=I got in my car and drove to the local nursery to look at trees .
#text=I had an idea of what I wanted in mind , but they had so many different trees when I got there that I had a very hard time deciding .
#text=Finally , I just decided to go with the tree I had originally planned to purchase .
#text=I went to the cashier and paid for the tree and loaded it in my truck to drive home .
#text=Once I got home , I brought the tree out to the spot in my yard where I had dug the hole .
#text=I unwrapped the bottom of the tree that had been wrapped up to prevent a mess , and I placed it in the dirt .
#text=I packed the dirt I had dug up around the bottom of the tree to keep it secure , and I watered it and tied some stakes up to keep the tree level and upright .
